short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension that maps news content on the Minimap.ai Web Application in real time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension enhances your daily news browsing experience by integrating with the Minimap.ai web application. Simply open the Minimap.ai web application (https://minimap.ai) in a separate Chrome tab. As you consume content, key details from news and social media sites—such as the author, source, and text—are gathered by the extension and sent to the Minimap.ai platform for visualization and further exploration.

Currently supporting:

CNN - https://www.cnn.com/
AP News - https://apnews.com/
Hacker News - https://news.ycombinator.com
Reddit news subreddits (old format) - https://old.reddit.com
